746180.name: Doodle God Blitz - Complete OST Collection
746180.description:
This DLC contains music from Doodle God, Doodle God: 8-bit Mania, Doodle Devil, Doodle Mafia, Doodle Kingdom and Doodle Creatures

Files will be placed in your Doodle God folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Doodle God Blitz\OST

Tracklist
01. Demigod + Quicksilver
02. Void + Plasma
03. Law + Fun
04. Joy + Bits
05. Music + Alcohol
06. Pen + Pineapple
07. Human + Human
08. Weapon + Inferno
09. Bonus
10. Behind every great fortune
11. Hey Frank! This one’s for you!
12. Nothing Personal
13. Omerta
14. Wise Guy
15. Hell no!
16. Speak of the devil
17. Evil Twin
18. DNA
19. Engineering
20. Middle Earth
21. When I was your age
22. Bonus 2
746180.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 日语, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 瑞典语, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
